Package com.bandwidth.controllers

Class BaseController

java.lang.Object
com.bandwidth.controllers.BaseController
Direct Known Subclasses:
APIController, APIController, APIController, APIController
public abstract class BaseController
extends java.lang.Object
Base class for all Controllers.

    • validateResponse

      protected void validateResponse​(HttpResponse response, HttpContext context) throws ApiException
      Validates the response against HTTP errors defined at the API level
      Parameters:
      response - The response recieved
      context - Context of the request and the recieved response

    • makeHttpCallAsync

      public <T> java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<ApiResponse<T>> makeHttpCallAsync​(BaseController.RequestSupplier requestSupplier, BaseController.RequestExecutor requestExecutor, BaseController.ResponseHandler<T> responseHandler)
      Make an asynchronous HTTP endpoint call
      Parameters:
      requestSupplier - An object of RequestSupplier to supply an instance of HttpRequest
      requestExecutor - An object of RequestExecutor to execute the request & get the response
      responseHandler - An object of ResponseHandler to handle the endpoint response
      Returns:
      An object of type CompletableFuture
